msg: Reorganized the "Changes from ..." sections in appendexc.tex.

author: andreas
msg: Use UUID+language instead of URL as index keys. This way, the index doesn't have to be updated when the URL of a document changes. The URLs are resolved dynamically when the search results are presented.
